input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Creates a zone within the specified fabric and port.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>create-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1002</fabric-id> <port-id>1003</port-id> <zone>zonename</zone> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. port-id[Required] port identifier for a host, switch, or storage system. zone[Required] name of the zone you want to create. fabric-id[Required] the fabric identifier.
2. Creates a zone within the specified fabric and containing the specified zone alias.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>create-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1002</fabric-id> <zonealias-id>1004</zonealias-id> <zone>zonename</zone> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. fabric-id[Required] the fabric identifier zone[Required] name of the zone you want to create. zonealias-id[Required] the zonealias identifier.
3. Creates a zone within the specified fabric and port and containing the specified zone alias.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>create-zone</process-id> <command-arguments> <fabric-id>1002</fabric-id> <port-id>1003</port-id> <zonealias-id>1004</zonealias-id> <zone>zonename</zone> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. port-id[Required] port identifier for a host, switch, or storage system. fabric-id[Required] the fabric identifier zone[Required] name of the zone you want to create. zonealias-id[Required] the zonealias identifier.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Creates a zone within the specified fabric. 2. Creates a zone within the specified fabric and containing the specified zone alias. 3. Creates a zone within the specified fabric and port and containing the specified zone alias.
